extendedInfo.description: The College Network has developed its EARN it! App to give users the ability to share the importance of education with others by referring them to The College Network. We'll reward customers with $200 and non-customers with $150 for each person they refer who enrolls in one of our programs. Download this free app, and be rewarded for helping others!Weâre also giving you the ability to view our company blog in real time. With this app, you can learn more about The College Network and our passion for educating adults throughout the world.
